game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player is a class representation for a poker player The class player composes of its hand and the amount of money they have

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int iid, java.lang.String iname, int imoney)
      Constructor class for setting up the player and determining how much money they start with.

      • addToHand

        public boolean addToHand(Card card)
        Adds a card to the hand if the player has 0 or 1 cards, and returns true
        Parameters:
        card - card to be added
        Returns:
        returns false if card was not added, true if it was
